mapper.select: select pNo, member_id as bookMarkId, p_name as pName, p_price as pPrice from product_bookmark where pNo = #{pNo} and member_id = #{bookMarkId}
mapper.delete: delete from product_bookmark where pNo = #{pNo} and member_id = #{bookMarkId}
mapper.select: select rownum as rnum, b.* from (select bm_No as bmNo, pNo, member_id as bookMarkId, product_bookmark.p_name as pName, product_bookmark.p_price as pPrice, p_img as pImg from product_bookmark join market_product on(p_no = pNo))b where bmNo between #{start} and #{end} and bookMarkId = #{bookMarkId} order by 1 desc
